did.unittitle: Joseph A. Bongiorno Collection of Passenger Operations Services of the New Haven Railroad.
did.abstract: The collection contains publications used by Mr. Bongiorno for his paper "The administration of the passenger operation services of the New Haven Railroad."

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The collection contains publications used by Mr. Bongiorno for his paper “The administration of the passenger operation services of the New Haven Railroad.” A copy of the paper is included in this finding aid as an appendix (also located in University Railroad Collection, Boxed materials).

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: Archives & Special Collections has a substantial collection of materials pertaining to southern New England railroads. For detailed information on these collections please contact the curator or ask at the reference desk.
